titles.title: No Tax Write-offs for Corporate Wrongdoers Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow any deduction for punitive damages, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/13/2015--Introduced. No Tax Write-offs for Corporate Wrongdoers Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) deny a tax deduction for any amount paid or incurred for punitive damages in connection with any judgment in, or settlement of, any legal action; and (2) include any amount paid as punitive damages in gross income for income tax purposes.
